prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that has a large plant on its back and a friendly smile.
Show me a small, cute Pokemon with a green body and a bulb on its back.
Imagine a Pokemon with a round body, short legs, and a leafy top, perfect for a forest setting.
Generate a Pokemon with bright red eyes and a vibrant green color scheme, ideal for battling in nature.
Give me an image of a starter Pokemon that looks like a small dinosaur with a plant growing on it.
Design a Pokemon that has a gentle personality and is often found in grassy areas.
Make a Pokemon that evolves into a powerful creature but starts off as a small, green character.
